name: Atem Network
introduce: Atem Network is a decentralized content creation protocol aims at helping creators tokenize their content and build web3 communities. For every content, creators can launch corresponding NFTs for users to collect and trade. AtemChat is a token-gated community social platform, where creators can connect with their fans via the same NFTs they hold. AtemReview is a Web3 content-sharing platform, where creators can create their Web3 native graphical notes, and earn social incentives by interacting with their fans.
